name: Iapholi
content:
Iapholi

Child of Bloodstone

Source Pathfinder #144: Midwives to Death pg. 75
Pathfinder Wiki Iapholi

Details

Alignment N
Pantheon Iblydan Hero-Gods
Areas of Concern Monstrous heritage, acceptance
Domains Community, Glory, Strength
Subdomains Family, Resolve
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon tail slap or heavy flail

On Golarion

Centers of Worship Dhuraxilis
Nationality monster

Unique Spell Rules

Source Pathfinder #144: Midwives to Death pg. 74

Cleric/Warpriest

Beast Shape III can be prepared as a 5th-level spell [magical beast only]
Beast Shape IV can be prepared as a 6th-level spell [magical beast only]
Magical Beast Shape can be prepared as a 7th-level spell

Oracle

Beast Shape III can be prepared as a 5th-level spell [magical beast only]
Beast Shape IV can be prepared as a 6th-level spell [magical beast only]
Magical Beast Shape can be prepared as a 7th-level spell

Other Rules

Source Pathfinder #144: Midwives to Death pg. 75
Iapholi can grant 9th-level spells
